bug.author: willbattel
bug.description:
It seems the docs need to be updated to use the new tensorboard command. <denchmark-link:https://cloud.google.com/ml-engine/docs/tensorflow/flowers-tutorial#monitor_training_progress>https://cloud.google.com/ml-engine/docs/tensorflow/flowers-tutorial#monitor_training_progress</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/thedriftofwords>@thedriftofwords</denchmark-link> can we open docs bug and close this issue.
